column4: Please provide the title/name of the activity.
text
Please provide a brief description of this activity.
text area
Does this activity generate revenue for the company?
options (single)
Yes - the company generates revenue directly from the activity (e.g. sales of products or services)
column5: Yes - the company doesn't earn revenues directly from the activity, but other individuals / organisations directly fund this activity
column6: No - the company performs this activity at its own expense

column4: How much revenue did the company earn during the period as a direct result of this activity?
This may include revenue from direct purchases, membership dues, subscription fees, project funding, or other revenues.
number
currency
Revenue (in US dollars)
Are the direct costs that relate to this activity able to be calculated?
This may include material inputs, direct labour costs, licensing fees, and other costs. This should include complex allocations of general overheads or administrative costs.
options (single)
Yes - the direct costs for this activity are able to be calculated or reasonably estimated from the total company costs
column5: No - the direct costs for this activity are unable to be accurately separated from other costs.
Note that because this data is required to produce certain charts within the Reports section, selecting this option will result in a less complete Report.

column4: How much cost was incurred by the company during the period which was directly related to performing this activity?
number
currency
Costs (in US dollars)
What stage of maturity best describes this activity for the company?
options (single)
Early development
A new activity, with no or little results achieved yet.
column5: The activity is being tested on the ground; pricing, demand, and viability are being determined.
column6: The market fit has been confirmed, and emphasis is now on building capacity and growth.
column7: The activity is established in multiple markets, with a stable delivery model.
